General.Name: Green Resources Public Company Limited
General.Description: Green Resources Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate development business in Thailand. The company engages in the development and sales of various properties, such as condominiums. It also generates and distributes electricity from solar projects; sells products with installation of solar-cell systems; and rents properties. The company was formerly known as Asia Corporate Development Public Company Limited and changed its name to Green Resources Public Company Limited in February 2016. Green Resources Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Nonthaburi, Thailand.
General.Address: 405 Soi 13 Bond Street Road, Nonthaburi, Thailand, 11120
